text: There is no standard treatment for stage 4S neuroblastoma but treatment options include the following:         -  Observation with supportive care for certain children who have favorable tumor biology and do not have signs or symptoms.    -  Chemotherapy, for children who have signs or symptoms of neuroblastoma or unfavorable tumor biology, or for very young infants.    - A clinical trial of treatment based on the tumor's response to treatment and tumor biology.
